README:
Polcovar
========

This is the Polcovar software for computing the mean and variance of
subgraph counts in random graphs.  Read the article on arXiv:

https://arxiv.org/abs/1402.5835

This source code also includes the source of that article. 

How to use it 
-------------

Polcovar is written in Matlab. 

The two main entry points are polcovar_mu.m and polcovar_sigma.m.

See polcovar_example.m for an example. 

This project uses Stu instead of Make.  Get Stu at

https://github.com/kunegis/stu

description: Subgraph count statistics in Erdős–Rényi graphs
